greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f. exp( x^2 * exp(x) ).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..516 (terms 0..200 from Vincenzo Librandi)
Vaclav Kotesovec, Asymptotic solution of the equations using the Lambert W-function
formula: a(n) ~ n^n / (exp(n*(1+r)/(2+r)) * r^n * sqrt((1+r)*(4+r)/(2+r))), where r is the root of the equation r^2*(2+r)*exp(r) = n.
a(n) = Sum_{k = 0..n/2} C(n,2*k) * ((2*k)!/k!) * k^(n-2*k). - _David Einstein_, Oct 30 2016
results.author: _Joerg Arndt_, Sep 14 2012
